infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Monzi uses the camera to capture selfies for KYC verification and to scan payment account numbers for quick and accurate money transfers.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Monzi needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload written or typed account details for easy payment.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Monzi uses Face ID to provide secure and convenient access to your financial account.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Monzi may access location data to enhance security features and provide location-based services for your financial transactions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Monzi uses background location to notify you when you're near payment locations and to provide location-based payment suggestions.
